textTemplates.text:

Result

textTemplates.description: Pharos Flow Template for Log After: Start, Before: Send Notification PE
textTemplates.name: h_2854b3bab80c3df00a81a73ac711a3e0_Pharos_Template
textTemplates.text:
An Error Occurred with Your "DY Platform Event Triggered flow" Flow

You've received this email because an error occurred while your "DY Platform Event Triggered flow" flow was running. Debug this flow in Flow Builder.

Error element debug (FlowActionCall).
Debug: end


Open Flow


Flow Error Details

Flow Details

Flow API Name: testnewmp__DY_Platform_Event_Triggered_flow
Type: Flow
Version: 14
Status: Draft
Org: {!$Organization.Id} ({!$Organization.Name})


Flow Interview Details

Interview Label: DY Platform Event Triggered flow
Interview GUID: {!$Flow.InterviewGuid}
Current User: {!$User.FirstName} {!$User.LastName}
Start time: {!$Flow.InterviewStartTime}
Duration: 0


How the Interview Started
{!$User.FirstName} {!$User.LastName} ({!$User.Id}) started the flow interview.
API Version for Running the Flow: 63.0
Some of this flow's variables were set when the interview started.
$Record = FlowExecutionErrorEvent ({!$Record})
